title: Hash1Gaming - Recruiting Junglers/Support - Competitive 5's - High Dia/Master/Challenger

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hey there, 

Update: If you're a Jungle or Support main, please add me in-game prior to your application so we can speed things up :).

We're currently looking for players to join our competitive roster and play alongside our teams in Tournaments, LAN events and 5v5 queues. If you're a competitive player who wishes to improve your judgement, shot calling and your general knowledge of League of Legends, Hash1Gaming is for you! We're looking for players who are willing to learn from our Coaches and Analysts, as well as work closely with their team manager to ensure that our team can provide a stimulating learning environment for each player.

Our ideal applicant would:
1. Be available to Scrim and attend 5v5 Queues at least 5 times per week
2. Be over the age of 16 (No younger than 14)
3. Able to play consistently in more than one role
4. Strive to be the best player he/she could possibly be. We don't want people who are content, we want people who want to improve!
5. Take advice from our Coaches and Analysts without getting 'salty'. All advice we give is to help you and the team perform better!


If you think you'd be a good fit for one of our competitive teams, we'd like you to apply!

http://hash1.pw/joinhash1

If you've got any questions, feel free to add me in-game or shoot an email to Admin[@]Hash1Gaming.com

Cheers,

Tom G.
Managing Partner of HashOneGaming
